welcomeScreen.title: Merry Christmas, Naina

welcomeScreen.message: I made this little world for you, Naina — a place filled with warmth, music, gentle poems, and dreams waiting to bloom. May it remind you of your own light and magic this Christmas.

title: A Christmas Eve for Naina

subtitle.mobile: Touch to reveal the poetry of your night
subtitle.desktop: Move your cursor to reveal the poetry of your night

scrollHint: Scroll to step into the magic

narrativeFragments.text:
Snow drifts silently, wrapping the night in white. 
Naina, in your eyes — the world unfolds: stars shimmering, dreams sparkling. Every glance you give the universe is a wish, every sight you behold is a poem waiting to bloom.

Candles flicker like tiny suns, their warmth embracing every corner. 
You are a light, Naina; love yourself as fiercely as the world needs your glow.

A gentle melody floats through the air, soft as falling snow. 
Music lives in your soul — every note a reminder that joy grows when you nurture your dreams.

Cocoa in your hands, cinnamon on your lips, pine scent in the air. 
Pause, Naina, and feel the wonder: happiness blooms when you honor your own heart.

The clock whispers toward midnight. 
In this quiet hour, believe: you are enough, you are loved, and everything you’ve dreamed of is waiting for you.

Close your eyes. Make a wish. 
Let it rise with the snowflakes into the starlit sky — the love you give yourself carries all your dreams home.

endingSection.heading: A Letter for You, Naina
endingSection.subheading: Click the envelope to receive my Christmas message

letter.body: May your days shimmer with joy, your heart overflow with love, and your dreams unfold like the brightest stars. Believe in yourself, cherish your magic, and know that everything you hope for is already on its way. Always, remember: you are beautiful, brave, and infinitely loved.

riddleSection.heading: If You Ever Want to Know Who I Am...
riddleSection.subheading: A gentle trail of whispers for your heart, Naina ✨

riddles.text:
Where warmth hums softly and love lingers unseen, 
pause a moment, breathe, and feel the gentle glow.

Little touches awaken hidden songs, 
like snowflakes landing three times upon the quiet earth.

At the hour when wishes rise and the world holds its breath, 
listen closely — the unseen smile hums your name at 11.11.

Curiosity and patience are keys of light, 
follow the gentle path and discover a hello stitched with care.

riddleSection.hint: For a secret, try clicking the very last golden paragraph at the bottom of this page… ✨

footer.madeWith: Made with love from me to Naina ♡ …and make a wish at 11.11 ✨
